DataElement.preferredName: Central Nervous System Status Stratification Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response related to the participants sequence of grades or ranks as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis addressing the status of the Central Nervous System.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the examination of the patient's CNS status.

Concepts.definition: The part of the nervous system that consists of the brain, spinal cord, and meninges.

Property.preferredDefinition: Evaluation; the act of placing value on something.

Concepts.definition: Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
